alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:59AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Comanche, Jackson, central Kiowa, western Tillman, east central Greer, northeastern Foard, Wilbarger and southeastern Hardeman Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 459 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles south of Lone Wolf to near Olustee to 8 miles west of Medicine Mound. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Altus, Vernon, Frederick, Snyder, Tipton, Blair, Chillicothe, Olustee, Mountain Park, Davidson, Roosevelt, Manitou, Martha, Elmer, Headrick, Friendship, Cooperton, Altus Air Force Base, Tom Steed Reservoir, and Margaret. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
